title: "Oman data centre market seen growing to $428mln by 2028"
excerpt: "Muscat – The size of Oman’s data centre market was valued at US$247mn in 2022 and is expected to reach US$428mn by 2028, growing at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 9.6 per cent over the next six years, according to a new research report."
